name: Node.js Sample
description: A barebones Node.js app using Express

JWT_SIGNING_SECRET.description: JWT Signing Secret - from Journey Builder.

IS_ENDPOINT.description: Fully qualified IS Event API URL (format: https://[ACCOUNT].devergage.com/api2/event/[DATASET]])

APPLICATION_DOMAIN.description: URL of your Heroku App, without the trailing backslash (format: https://[APP NAME].herokuapp.com)

IS_PRODUCTION.description: Flag to indicated production environment. Must always be True
